title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 647.10 - Exhaustion of remedies before the board
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 647.10 - Exhaustion of remedies before the board

State Regulations
(a) The timely filing of any notice of appeal
before the board shall preclude any party seeking judicial review of the
decision or order of the commissioner, agency or APA until after such time as
the board has ruled. (b) The
institution of any judicial proceeding to review a decision, determination or
order of the commissioner, agency or APA, prior to the filing of a notice of
appeal with the board, shall preclude the institution of any proceeding before
the board to review such decision, determination or order. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
647.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
